categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic short stories

nodes.text: Wanted: Dead and Dismantled is a short story published in the developer blog for Star Wars: The Old Republic on August 26, 2014. It depicts a conversation between BH-7X and a bounty hunter named Kern after an unsuccessful attempt to apprehend Jakarro and C2-D4 that resulted in Kern's partner Depu's death. The short story is a companion to the Manaan Flashpoint released as part on Update 2.9 on August 19, where Jakarro and C2-D4 were first introduced.
